title: Repository of functions to standardise common DfE R tasks
text: dfeR R package designed help standardise R programming across Department Education (DfE) facilitate sharing business specific functions. Scope dfeR open DfE anything think useful programmers analysts can contributed. Functionality expected focus around following: Templates analytical projects Publication R Markdown Templates Working Microsoft SQL Databases DfE specific formatting Documentation included package far available http://dfe-analytical-services.github.io/dfeR/

title: Format academic year — formatAY
text: function formats academic year variables reporting purposes. convert academic year input 201516 format 2015/16 format.

title: Round five up — roundFiveUp
text: Round number specified number places, 5's rounded . alternative round base R, sometimes rounds 5's due international standard. information see round() documentation: https://stat.ethz.ch/R-manual/R-devel/library/base/html/Round.html

title: Round five up — roundFiveUp
text: can use negative value decimal places. example: -1 round nearest 10 -2 round nearest 100 .
